mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of a child in the Bosworth family. Pose 1 from 1924 is a head shot with a serious expression. Pose 2 from 1925 is a charming full-length portrait with a rather rueful expression. The glass plate negatives were inscribed with Mrs. Jas. Bosworth. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of Child in Bosworth Family (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
